tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vegetation_indices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    ndvi DOUBLE PRECISION,
    evi DOUBLE PRECISION,
    date_observed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE vegetation_indices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    index_name VARCHAR(50),
    index_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE spatial_distribution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    index_name VARCHAR(50),
    longitude FLOAT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vegetation_indices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    index_name VARCHAR(50),
    index_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(50),
    acquisition_date DATE,
    image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_source_name VARCHAR(50),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ndvi_values (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL(8,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    ndvi_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(50),
    image_date DATE,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE vegetation_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE image_processing (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    process_date TIMESTAMP,
    processing_steps TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE image_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    source_url VARCHAR(100)
)
